item.description:
Join us for YOGALICIOUS: an evening of fun yoga, guided meditation, music and socializing. Come to unwind after work/school. Meet cool people, learn some tips to refresh & re-energize, and explore a hip & happening wellness center. No experience or special clothing necessary.

This seminar is part of a series of events leading up to the Art of Living Foundationâ€™s largest US conference of the year taking place in Hartford, CT in July with Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.

More info call 860-880-0260 or visit http://us.artofliving...
Start Time: 6:30pm

All are welcome!
;-)
item.name: Yogalicious
